author: Duplicate SAJALX
post_text: November 3, 2014 at 5:15â€¯AM#1Hey all,I'm looking to make a Macro to select a range of channels but only the ones that have a level.I'm trying the IfOutput command combined with "Channels X thru Y" variations with out any luck.Once I get the command syntax the Macro should be easy.I want to be able to tap the Macro, input a range of numbers "1 Thru 5 + 8 Thru 12" for example, and have it select only the fixtures in that range that have a level above 0.Thanks,Brennan
title: Thru On Macro?
